name: oregonian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Oregon: Oregonians love golf, especially around Portland and Eugene. The dispute over whether to question foreign visitors has divided Oregonians.
More examplesFewer examplesAs Oregonians we were able to cast our mail-in ballots before Election Day.Any Oregonian knows that Medford is not a "metropolitan area".He said, "I just think it's part of being an Oregonian, that you return your bottles and cans".

belonging or relating to the US state of Oregon or its people: We were introduced to an Oregonian photographer. A quarter-million Oregonian households get their TV for free, over the air.
More examplesFewer examplesThis Oregonian band are also great live.I had an Oregonian pastry and a coffee.Oregonian singer Gail Bliss tells us that the lyrics to "Take Me Home Country Roads" were the first she ever learned.
